title: 'Chaotic' and slow British response left thousands of Afghans unable to flee the Taliban, whistleblower claims
content:
1. 'Chaotic' and slow British response left thousands of Afghans unable to flee the Taliban, whistleblower claims  CNN
  2. Raab denies prioritising animals over humans during Afghanistan evacuation  Guardian News
  3. Whistleblower: As Afghanistan fell, UK abandoned supporters  Associated Press
  4. WorldView: Whistleblower condemns U.K. evacuation of Afghanistan  CBS News
  5. Pen Farthing: ‘Animals in a cargo hold never got in the way of people getting on a flight’  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: 英国の対応が遅かったために、何千人ものアフガニスタン人がタリバンから逃れることができなかったと内部告発者が主張
举报人称，"混乱的 "和缓慢的英国反应使成千上万的阿富汗人无法逃离塔利班。
舉報人稱，"混亂的 "和緩慢的英國反應使成千上萬的阿富汗人無法逃離塔利班。
